name: Mercy
description: A guardian angel to those who come under her care, Mercy is a peerless healer, a brilliant scientist, and a staunch advocate for peace. Her Valkyrie Suit helps keep her close to teammates, enabling her to heal, resurrect, or strengthen them with her Caduceus Staff.

abilities.name: Guardian Angel
abilities.description: Fly towards an ally. While in flight, Jump launches you forward, and Crouch launches you upward.

abilities.name: Valkyrie
abilities.description: Gain the ability to fly. Abilities are enhanced.

story: Orphaned in the Omnic Crisis, child prodigy and nanotechnology pioneer Angela Ziegler became Overwatch’s most prominent combat medic and vocal proponent of global peace. After the organization’s fall, and with the coming of a new war, she wonders if she will ever know peace in her lifetime.
